sentences.sContent: Finally one of the managers bustled up to the stalwart darky .
sentences.sContent_eng: Finally one of the managers bustled up to the stalwart darky .
sentences.sCn: 后来终于有一个经理跑到这个健壮的黑人面前。

sentences.sContent: I knew I was never in any danger with my stalwart bodyguard around me.
sentences.sContent_eng: I knew I was never in any danger with my stalwart bodyguard around me.
sentences.sCn: 我知道有强壮的保镖在我的周围，我永远不会有什么危险。

sentences.sContent: Please be stalwart in your journey. We need you and rely upon your Light, Love and service as we co-create the New Earth together.
sentences.sContent_eng: Please be stalwart in your journey. We need you and rely upon your Light, Love and service as we co-create the New Earth together.
sentences.sCn: 坚定地行走你的旅程。我们需要你，依赖着你的光，爱和服务，随着我们共同创造新地球。

remMethod.val: stal(＝support) + wart(＝worth) → 值得依靠的 → 坚定的
